name: test_e2e_with_logs[007_SQLI_2ND_007]
description:

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_2ND_007` |
| **Name** | Second order via email field |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | second_order |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `test@x.com' OR '1'='1`
